javadoc: Generic interface to handle drag and drop.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the priority of this provider.  Higher priority services will be chosen
 if there are multiple services that accept the same type in the same context.
methods.name: getPriority
methods.comment:
Returns the priority of this provider.  Higher priority services will be chosen
 if there are multiple services that accept the same type in the same context.

methods.javadoc:
Get the data flavors that this drop service accepts.
@return an array of all DataFlavors that this drop service supports
methods.name: getDataFlavors
methods.comment: Get the data flavors that this drop service accepts.

return.comment: an array of all DataFlavors that this drop service supports

methods.name: isDropOk
methods.comment: Returns true if this service can accept a drop with the specified context.

params.name: contextObj
params.comment: The object where the drop will occur

params.name: evt
params.comment: The event associated with the drop that includes the dropped DataFlavors

methods.name: add
methods.comment: Adds the dropped data to this drop service.

params.name: contextObj
params.comment: The object where the drop occured

name: ProgramDropProvider
comment: Generic interface to handle drag and drop.
